metadata.Title: CVE-2023-31083 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in drivers/bluetooth/hci_ldisc.c in the Linux kernel 6.2. In hci_uart_tty_ioctl, there is a race condition between HCIUARTSETPROTO and HCIUARTGETPROTO. HCI_UART_PROTO_SET is set before hu->proto is set. A NULL pointer dereference may occur.

notes.Note: sbeattie> bluetooth-next commit is ff1b86784849 ("Bluetooth: hci_ldisc: check HCI_UART_PROTO_READY flag in HCIUARTGETPROTO") fix has not yet landed in linus' tree as of 2023.07.18
